meanings.sent1: The invirile plant struggled to stand tall in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The old man's invirile voice could barely be heard over the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The invirile kitten tried to pounce on a toy, but fell over instead.
meanings.sent4: His invirile attempts at lifting weights were like trying to move mountains with a feather.
meanings.sent5: The invirile flame flickered weakly before extinguishing completely.

meanings.sent1: The invirile bridge creaked under the weight of the car.
meanings.sent2: Her invirile attempt to open the jar resulted in it slipping from her hands.
meanings.sent3: The invirile puppy struggled to keep up with the other energetic dogs at the park.
meanings.sent4: His invirile excuse for missing the meeting was easily seen through.
meanings.sent5: The invirile light of the dying flashlight barely illuminated the dark room.

meanings.sent1: The invirile man shied away from any physical labor.
meanings.sent2: His invirile demeanor made him the target of teasing from his peers.
meanings.sent3: The invirile prince preferred reading poetry to engaging in sword fights.
meanings.sent4: Her invirile husband spent more time on skincare than on sports.
meanings.sent5: The invirile flower, delicate and colorful, stood out among the rugged rocks.
